content.text: 1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces" )

content.text: 1/2 red bell pepper, roasted and sliced
content.eamr: ( ing-12 "1/2 red bell pepper, roasted and sliced" )

content.text: 0) Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "oil"@8:11 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large skillet"@15:30 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium high heat"@36:52 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Saute chicken until lightly browned; remove from skillet and set aside.
2) Saute onion, garlic and green bell pepper until soft; stir in tomato sauce, saffron, salt and bouillon and return chicken pieces to skillet.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Saute"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion"@9:14 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "garlic"@16:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "green bell pepper"@27:44 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until soft"@45:55 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "stir in"@57:64 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "tomato sauce"@65:77 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "saffron"@79:86 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "salt"@88:92 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "bouillon"@97:105 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-2 "return"@110:116 / AC
		:ppt ( "chicken pieces"@117:131 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "skillet"@135:142 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Cook for 10 minutes, then add rice and reduce heat to low.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "10 minutes"@12:22 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "add"@29:32 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "rice"@33:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-2 "reduce"@42:48 / AC
		:ppt ( "heat"@49:53 / OTHER )
		:gol ( temp-3-0 "low"@57:60 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Add beer and simmer for 8 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until rice is tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "beer"@7:11 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "simmer"@16:22 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "8 to 10 minutes"@27:42 / DUR )
		:simultaneous ( ac-4-2 "stirring"@44:52 / AC )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until rice is tender"@67:87 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Finally, stir in peas with liquid and garnish with roasted red bell pepper.
